View My Work

I Specialize In

Web Development, creating UI/UX layouts for websites and mobile applications, as well as teaching foreign languages.

All of my design projects are well thought through and above all else - professional.

My creative process

1

Discuss The Project

First of all we discuss the details of the project.

2

Brainstorming

Then we can compare our ideas and find the best solutions.

3

UI/UX Planning

After that, I get down to work. I plan the design carefully so that it satisfies the newest trends.

4

Interaction

During the project realisation we obviously stay in touch and still can apply changes.
